Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo! I heard you're building a Ferris Wheel, so I
came by to lend a hand.
<PAGE>
So what's this "ferris wheel?" A ride that takes
people high in the sky, y'say? Huh. This must be
one'a them foreign blueprints.
<PAGE>
Well, that's a funny-lookin' contraption, but I get
how it's put together now.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, let's get to work! I'll give you some
pointers as we go, so do like I tell you, 'kay?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, looks like it's all done. So, how do you
actually operate this thing?
<PAGE>
Anyway, I'll be headin' on home, then.

The Ferris Wheel is complete! I should put it
somewhere.
